name: Johan J. Lukkien
content: Homepage of Johan Lukkien Home research education Publications Vacancies Home of Johan Lukkien, Welcome! I am full professor at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Eindhoven University of Technology (TUE). and since April 2017 I am dean of the department. Until 2017 I have been chairman of the section Security and Embedded Networked Systems consisting of two separate chairs: System Architecture and Networking (my chair) and Security. Since 2020, these two chairs form separate clusters. Cluster leader of SAN is Nirvana Meratnia. My research interests evolve around networked, resource constrained embedded systems. Other responsibilities Director EIRICT, 2011-2017 The Eindhoven Institute for Research on ICT is a virtual organization to stimulate ICT research. I did this work for 50% of my time. See http://eirict.win.tue.nl Scientific Director Software Technology, 2008-2011 Software Technology is the succesful postmaster training programme in Software Engineering and Software processes. It is an important connection with the industry in the Eindhoven area. Chair Education Committee Automotive Technology Master, since years Contact Visiting address: MetaForum 6.070, Mailing address: PO Box 513, 5600 MB Eindhoven Mailing address: De Rondom 70, 5612 AP Eindhoven Mail: j.j.lukkien@tue.nl Tel.: +31 40 2475147 Secretary: Anjolein Gouma, wsinsan@tue.nl Tel.: +31 40 2478203 I am not reachable through any social media.
